error: /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/install_name_tool: for: /Volumes/llv24macOS/git_projects/ml/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/lib/libcaffe2_detectron_ops_gpu.dylib (for architecture x86_64) option "

body:
@mratsim, maybe building scripts don’t detect environment correctly, but building is actually successfully finished. The failure happened during the object link phase, check:

error: /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/install_name_tool: for: /Volumes/llv24macOS/git_projects/ml/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/lib/libcaffe2_detectron_ops_gpu.dylib (for architecture x86_64) option "
